channel.title: 2 quesions about NPC Dialogues
channel.description: Well i am making some quests to my server atm and have 2 important questions... 1st. How can i make npc talk more than 1 line , i've tried a lot but it won't help , in dialogues.cfg there are text2 and text3 slots , if i write something in there npc wont say it , just text1. 2nd. How can i make npc add an item after finished talking him?[br][size=1]Posted on: July 19, 2007, 02:59:18 AM[/size][hr]Help please , thanks

item.title: 2 quesions about NPC Dialogues
item.dc:creator: @kristo_21 kristo 21
item.description:
@kristo_21 wrote:

Well i am making some quests to my server atm and have 2 important questions…
1st. How can i make npc talk more than 1 line , i’ve tried a lot but it won’t help , in dialogues.cfg there are text2 and text3 slots , if i write something in there npc wont say it , just text1.
2nd. How can i make npc add an item after finished talking him?[br][size=1]Posted on: July 19, 2007, 02:59:18 AM[/size][hr]Help please , thanks
